ecosim

Class NewickTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • ecosim.NewickTree

  • public class NewickTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads in a Newick tree from a file and provides options to traverse it.
    Author:
    Andrew Warner & Jason Wood
